page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES, BENGEO
page.content:
In {POM-POM-HOME }the catcher counts while the others hide. Everyone tries to return to base without being seen by him or they are out. One person returning, shouts pom-pom-home and frees all the others.
In {STUCK-IN-THE-MUD}one person is it. If he touches you, you are stuck. You stand with your legs open. Someone has to go through your legs and you are free.
In {SPOT-SOLDIER }a person counts and the other people have to creep towards him. The counter has to only look with one eye.The first person to be seen is it and then they have to count.
In {IT-ROUND-THE-WALL }you run in one direction without going back. If you are caught, you are it.
